DDR_CTRL_CONFIG

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x0
Size:
0x4

Description

The configuration of the DDR controller

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:21] drain_burst_len r 0x0 -
[20:9] axi_data_width r 0x0 -
[8:0] axi_addr_width r 0x0 -

Field Descriptions

drain_burst_len

Number of beats of the AXI transfer toward DDR

axi_data_width

Data width of the DDR controller AXI interface

axi_addr_width

Address width of the DDR controller AXI interface
